TitleEnglish: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?
SummaryEnglish: In a world, where the deities have descended from the heavens lies the town of Orario that features the Dungeon, which contains an assortment of monsters from goblins to dragons. Adventurers slay those monsters and take their shards, which are then used to craft magic items. To become an adventurer, people join groups called Familia. Each of which is named after and serves a resident deity. The adventurers and their attributes and abilities are ranked by level, improved by experience and supervised by their Familia's deity. Bell Cranel, a novice adventurer, is the sole member of the Familia under the goddess Hestia. After being saved by top level adventurer Ais Wallenstein of the Loki Familia, he falls in love with her and decides to improve and become worthy of her attention. All the while mostly unaware that other girls, deities and mortals, also develop feelings for him. Especially Hestia herself.
Aliases: Familia Myth

1.TitleEnglish: Is It Wrong to Expect a Hot Spring in a Dungeon?
1.SummaryEnglish: Immediately after defeating Black Goliath, Bell and the others make their way to the surface when they come across a previously uncharted path leading to a mysterious hot spring.
Aliases: DanMach OVA 1
Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? OVA 1
Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? OVA: Is It Wrong to Expect a Hot Spring in a Dungeon?

2.TitleEnglish: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?: Arrow of the Orion
2.SummaryEnglish: In the city of Orario, beneath an impossibly tall tower, lies the dungeon. Only adventurers who form partnerships with the gods themselves have any hope of defeating the monsters that lie within. But the dungeon is not the only place where monsters exist. Far from Orario, in the ruins of an ancient city, a new threat arises. To counter this threat, the goddess Artemis has come to Orario in search of a champion-but it's not Ais Wallenstein (the legendary Sword Princess) nor Ottar (the strongest warrior to ever enter the dungeon) that she chooses. Rather it is Bell Cranel, a newbie adventurer partnered with a low-tier goddess.
Aliases: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka Movie: Orion no Ya
Gekijouban Dungeon ni Deai o Motomeru no wa Machigatte Iru Darouka: Orion no Ya
DanMachi Movie

DanMachi Arrow of the Orion
Danmachi Orion no Ya
Danjon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darouka Orion no Ya

3.SummaryEnglish: Before the next chapter of the Familia Myth unfolds, Bell and Hestia take a moment to reflect upon their previous adventures. Recap of First Season.

4.TitleEnglish: Is It Wrong to go Searching for Herbs on a Deserted Island?
4.SummaryEnglish: Micah sends the Hestia familia on a quest to recover some medicinal herbs on "Paradise Island". Hestia, Lili, and Haruhime fight over who should spend time with Bell and choose to decide it with a swimsuit competition.
Aliases: DanMachi OVA 2

5.TitleEnglish: Is It Wrong to Crave a Hot Spring in Orario? (God of the Hot Spring Forever)
5.SummaryEnglish: A strange hot spring resort has suddenly sprung up in Orario. Since it appeared, people visited there daily to relieve stress and daily. Of course, Bell and the other faces of the Hestia Familia were seen within the crowd. However, there was a group of people who are suspicious of the popular resort... Hot spring, conspiracy and secret hidden behind the veil... After dazzling adventure, Bell witnesses the truth of it all!
Aliases: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? OVA 3
DanMachi OVA 3
Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? - OVA: Is It Wrong to Crave a Hot Spring in Orario? (God of the Hot Spring Forever)

6.SummaryEnglish: What’s past is prologue. Bell has come a long way and he and Hestia reflect upon the events that forged him into the adventurer he is today.

1.SummaryEnglish: The Labyrinth city of Orario has a massive dungeon at its heart, filled with terrifying beasts. A new adventurer, Bell Crannel, challenges this perilous labyrinth, but not in hopes of finding treasure, but in hopes of picking up a girl.

2.SummaryEnglish: Bell Crannel's power grows rapidly thanks to his ability, Realis Phrase. As long as he's in love with a girl, it will continue to make him stronger. His goddess, Hestia, is jealous that the girl he's in love with isn't her, but still wants to support him. She goes to another goddess and asks her to make him a powerful sword.

3.TitleEnglish: (Hestia Knife) The Blade of a God
3.SummaryEnglish: "I don't want to lose any more of my family." Bell and Hestia are attacked by an escaped monster during Monster Philia. Bell fights to save the only family he has left, but is overwhlemed by the monster.

4.SummaryEnglish: "Excuse me, are you looking for a supporter?" After his rapid growth, Bell reaches the 7th floor of the dungeon. He gets new equipment and is ready to go when a girl named Lilika approaches him. She is a supporter, and her job is to aide adventurers in the dungeon.

5.SummaryEnglish: With Lili's help, Bell is progressing further into the dungeon than ever. Since he can focus on the fights, he can make more money. But Lili has a secret: she despises adventurers, and is waiting for a chance to trick Bell.

6.SummaryEnglish: Lili leads Bell deep into a dungeon and abandons him. He's alone and surrounded by larger monsters than he's ever faced. She runs off with his knife and makes for the exit, but her guild mates are waiting for her.

7.SummaryEnglish: At Bell's urging, Hestia reluctantly lets Lili into the party. Bell, worried about his weakness as he continues to go deeper into the dungeons, accepts an offer of help from Aiz Wallenstein, the girl he loves.

8.SummaryEnglish: For an adventurer to level up, and truly get stronger, he has to go on an adventure. Bell travels down to the lowest of the upper floors of the dungeon, where he encounters a minotaur with a giant sword. Lili is badly injured, and Bell is unable to leave her behind. Aiz arrives again to save him, but he waves her off...

9.SummaryEnglish: Bell defeats the minotaur and becomes the fastest adventurer to level up in history. After his success, Bell is given the nickname "Little Rookie." As he sets his sights on the middle floors of the dungeon, Ryuu tells him that if he wants to succeed, he's going to need a bigger party.

10.SummaryEnglish: The party is exploring on the middle floors when another group leads a huge train of monsters to them. They're overwhelmed and caught in a cave-in. Cut off from the upper floors, with limited supplies and little strength left, they are forced to make a desperate attempt to reach the safe zone even deeper in the dungeon.

11.SummaryEnglish: After a great struggle, Bell and his party finally reach the 18th floor. Aiz Wallenstein and the Loki Familia are already there, returning from their expedition to the lowest levels of the dungeon. With the danger passed, they enjoy a short break before they head back up to the town.

12.SummaryEnglish: A massive floor boss has crashed down from the upper floors and begun tearing apart the adventurers. Aiz has left for the surface, and it's up to Bell and his friends to defeat the monster. With their escape route cut off, it's do or die if they ever want to see the light of the sun again.

13.TitleEnglish: (Familia Myth) The Story of a Familia
13.SummaryEnglish: A massive floor boss falls from above and traps the adventurers. The only way out is up, and to get back home Bell will have to defeat it without Aiz's help.

1.SummaryEnglish: Bell's back with a new adventure! When the powerful leader of the Apollo Familia takes notice of him, his life with his Goddess is under threat.

2.SummaryEnglish: Apollo Familia has laid down their challenge, but Hestia refuses. Apollo tries to force her hand...

3.SummaryEnglish: Bell goes to train for the War Game, and it's up to the rest of the party to rescue Lili. Hestia puts her plan into action, but Lili refuses to leave the Soma Familia.

4.SummaryEnglish: It's time for the War Games, and the Hestia Family, and its new members, are ready. Can they defeat the entire Apollo Familia and save Bell from Apollo's clutches?

5.SummaryEnglish: The Hestia Familia was victorious in their battle against Apollo, and now they've won a huge mansion and a giant pile of cash! Hestia sets out to recruit for the Familia, but there's something she's forgetting...

6.SummaryEnglish: Bell is caught up in a new adventure that takes him to the seedy underbelly of Orario: the pleasure quarters.

7.SummaryEnglish: With the help of Haruhime the Renard, Bell escapes from the Amazoness prostitutes. But he begins to wonder about Haruhime, who says she was forced to be a prostitute against her will and isn't worth being saved.

8.SummaryEnglish: Bell decides he's going to get money in the dungeon to purchase Haruhime. But he runs into a trap when the Ishtar Familia decides to kidnap him.

9.SummaryEnglish: With the true purpose of the ritual and the killing stone revealed, Bell decides that he's going to take any risk to save Haruhime.

10.SummaryEnglish: The Ishtar Familia's plan has been found out by Freya, who launches a raid on their home. Just when things are bad enough for Bell, their interference brings even more chaos!

11.SummaryEnglish: With Haruhime safe at the Familia, things begin to calm down. But when Hestia makes a casual pass at Bell and he shuts her down hard, she runs out of the mansion and into the waiting arms of kidnappers!

12.SummaryEnglish: Bell and Hestia spend a relaxing few days at a village in the wilderness, and participate in a local festival. Bell ponders what to do about his relationship with his immortal Goddess, and if he really is ready to love her.

1.SummaryEnglish: Monsters are evil abominations driven by murderous instinct. But if that were true, why is this one a scared little girl who doesn’t understand why she’s being hunted?

2.SummaryEnglish: Who knows what could happen if word of Wiene’s existence spread. The Hestia Familia needs answers and soon, but what they discover in the dungeon only raises more questions...

3.SummaryEnglish: The Guild knows about Wiene. But instead of demanding answers, it assigns the Hestia Familia a mission they cannot refuse. Something awaits them in the dungeon’s darkness.

4.SummaryEnglish: There are others like Wiene, and they call themselves Xenos. Uranus asks much from the Hestia Familia, but if anyone can bridge the gap between species, it’s them.

5.SummaryEnglish: It was supposed to be the dawning of a new era. But selfish, evil men only care about what they can take for themselves, leaving others to face the consequences.

6.SummaryEnglish: Bell shouldn’t get involved. But the young adventurer has already decided otherwise. Little does he know that he’ll help Fels discover a secret even Uranus doesn’t know.

7.SummaryEnglish: Never underestimate the measures a fanatic will take to prove his worldview correct.

8.SummaryEnglish: The Loki Familia are battle-hardened veterans used to fighting monsters. But this opponent is different...

9.SummaryEnglish: Although Ikelos has been successfully scapegoated, public opinion turns on Bell. Helping the Xenos will now prove impossible — but Hermes’ intel might just change the tide.

10.SummaryEnglish: The surface is no longer safe for the Xenos. Now, the Hestia Familia must smuggle them back into the Dungeon. There’s just one problem: The Loki Familia stand in the way.

11.SummaryEnglish: Bell WILL stay true to his ideals. Even if that means making an enemy of the woman he loves.

12.SummaryEnglish: As Hermes finally reveals his true intentions, Bell battles the most powerful opponent he’s ever faced.

1.SummaryEnglish: Gather your party and venture forth, Bell. The dungeon awaits.

2.TitleEnglish: The Great Falls | The Great Falls
2.SummaryEnglish: Bell and his party are making good time and will soon enter the lower floors. But the dungeon crawl is going too smoothly, and Cassandra cannot shake her earlier premonition.

3.SummaryEnglish: The party has two options: either retreat to the surface with the injured or hunt the monster and hope its defeat will dispel the ailment. Both choices carry dire risks.

4.TitleEnglish: Mermaid | The Girl of Water City
4.SummaryEnglish: The party learns too late that the Moss Huge can use other monsters against them. Meanwhile, Bell is alone, but not without allies; the Xenos have not forgotten his kindness.

5.TitleEnglish: Argo Vesta | Heroic Slash of Holy Flame
5.SummaryEnglish: Haruhime’s new ability turns the tide of battle, but the Moss Huge has proven that it knows what it’s doing. As the party strategist, Lili has a hard choice to make.

6.SummaryEnglish: Bell’s exploits have earned him fame and a new alias, and Lili worries that means change is coming. Meanwhile, Ryu left a note for her coworkers and vanished soon afterwards.

7.SummaryEnglish: Ryu, the Gale Wind, stands accused of murder. Bell and his party need answers, but only Cassandra knows that tragedy will befall them if they pursue their friend.

8.SummaryEnglish: Ryu couldn't be the killer... right? Bell wants to help his friend, but as the body count grows higher, he must ask himself how well he truly knows her.

9.SummaryEnglish: While Bell and Ryu contend with Jura and his insidious abilities, the rest of Bell’s allies uncover a barrel of bad apples in the dungeon’s dark depths.

10.SummaryEnglish: Some monsters you must fight and from others you must flee. But beware the Juggernaut lest you simply cease to be.

11.SummaryEnglish: The Juggernaut slaughters its way through a dwindling number of survivors, forcing Ryu to face her demons.

12.SummaryEnglish: With retreat an impossibility, Bell’s party fight for their lives when a Floor Boss spawns early. However, they are all adventurers; they will not die so easily.

13.SummaryEnglish: Critically wounded and trapped within the dungeon’s darkened depths, Bell and Ryu’s adventure is over. Their fight for survival has now begun.

14.SummaryEnglish: The boss fight extracts a heavy toll on the party, and they must make a choice. If they go one way, they will live. But if they go the other? They will die.

15.SummaryEnglish: The party narrowly survived, and now they must search for their missing friends. However, they’re facing more than just monsters; they’re fighting the Dungeon itself.

16.SummaryEnglish: Bell and Ryu must cast reservations aside in the face of death. Meanwhile, Welf faces a trial by fire he cannot fail; lives are at stake.

17.SummaryEnglish: Bell and Ryu’s relationship deepens as the trauma of the Deep Floors pushes them past their limits. They have each other, and that is the only reason they’re both still alive.

18.SummaryEnglish: Hope glimmers in the darkness; the Xenos appear in the party’s hour of need, and Bell and Ryu make steady progress despite all odds. They may all survive this after all.

19.SummaryEnglish: Their luck couldn’t last forever; Bell and Ryu must cross the Colosseum, where monsters constantly respawn. In the end, they may face an impossible choice…

20.SummaryEnglish: It is too late for the Astrea Familia. Their story ends in tragedy, and this is the tale of how Ryu's life changed forever on that dark day.

21.SummaryEnglish: Ryu’s feelings for Bell have changed in a way she cannot quite place. All she knows is that she cannot lose him; she just cannot.

22.SummaryEnglish: After five years of grief, guilt and pain, Ryu finally faces a new path—a new justice. The Juggernaut should beware.

1.SummaryEnglish: Syr is not the only one who has feelings for Bell. When she notices the shift in her friend’s behavior, she asks Ryu a question that shakes the elf to the core.

2.SummaryEnglish: Hedin will not allow Bell’s date with Syr to proceed. Not until Bell can properly woo her; not until he learns... how to pick up girls in a dungeon.

3.SummaryEnglish: Bell and Syr finally go on their festival date. Unfortunately, several meddlesome groups insist on being the third wheel.

4.SummaryEnglish: Bell can’t act the dense, indecisive fool—not after Syr poured her heart out to him. He must respond to her feelings honestly, but now the Freya Familia is trying to kill her.

5.SummaryEnglish: Syr had her chance. It’s Freya’s turn now, and the goddess will use any means necessary to make all of Orario understand that Bell is hers. Completely. Undeniably. Hers.

6.SummaryEnglish: Bell claims he’s part of the Hestia Familia. But that can’t be right, he’s always been part of the Freya Familia. His own Familia and goddess wouldn’t lie to him, right?

7.SummaryEnglish: Freya’s control was never absolute. There will always be those who slipped through the cracks and cannot accept the new status quo.

8.SummaryEnglish: Everyone has a breaking point, and Bell is approaching his limit. He has two choices left: he can either give in and accept Freya’s affections, or forge ahead as his true self.

9.TitleEnglish: Vesta | Altar of the Sacred Flame
9.SummaryEnglish: As Bell discovers the truth about Syr and confronts Freya, Hestia unleashes her power. She is the Goddess of the Hearth, which makes her the most formidable deity in Orario.

10.TitleEnglish: War Game | The Great Faction Battle
10.SummaryEnglish: Freya declares a War Game against the Hestia Famila. The terms are simple: if Freya wins, Bell will be hers. But if she loses? She will return to Heaven.

11.SummaryEnglish: The Hestia Familia may have formed an alliance for the War Game, but the Freya Familia earned its fearsome reputation for a reason. The allied army is about to find out why.

12.SummaryEnglish: Defeat is imminent. As the allied army falls, they need a miracle to win. But just as all hope fades, a gale-force wind begins to howl.

13.SummaryEnglish: Unexpected reinforcements and a sudden betrayal have turned the tide of battle. The allied army now has a chance at victory, but they must fight tooth and nail to seize it.

14.TitleEnglish: Einherjar | The Warriors of the Goddess
14.SummaryEnglish: Only two adventurers stand between the allied army and Freya. Unfortunately, Ottarl and Allen are the Freya Familia's most formidable warriors.

15.SummaryEnglish: Freya loved a mortal who would never love her back, and both she and others suffered for it. The conflict she started is ending, and the goddess must face her final fate.
